pkgmetadata.longdescription: Systematic Conservation Prioritization in R // Solve systematic reserve design problems using integer programming techniques. To solve problems most efficiently users can install three optional packages not available on CRAN: the 'gurobi' optimizer (available from http://www.gurobi.com/) and the conservation prioritization package 'marxan' (available from https://github.com/jeffreyhanson/marxan).
